netapp_volumes_snapshots_restore_descrip: Are you sure you want to restore the following volume?
netapp_volumes_snapshots_restore_confirm: Warning: Executing this action will restore the data on the {{volume}} volume to the state it was in when the snapshot was captured. Any data that is modified on the volume after {{date}} will then be permanently deleted. If in doubt, please refer to our KBs or contact support directly. Please double-check the name of the volume to restore before confirming the action
netapp_volumes_snapshots_restore_success: Your volume has been restored and will become active in a few moments.
netapp_volumes_snapshots_restore_error:
Your volume could not be restored:
{{message}}
request_id: {{requestId}}
netapp_volumes_snapshots_hold_error: A problem occurred while changing your snapshot to manual
netapp_volumes_snapshots_restore_system_: None of the snapshots meet the requirements for restoring your volume. If in doubt, please refer to our documentation or contact support directly.
